Title: Includes chiropractors in health maintenance organizations
Summary: Includes chiropractic services within the definition of "comprehensive health services" for purposes of health maintenance organizations; enables a member of a health maintenance organization to request the services of a chiropractor when the member has an ailment, illness, condition or injury, the treatment for which falls within the scope of a licensed chiropractor.
LawCode: Amd ยง4401, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the inclusion of chiropractors in health maintenance organizations
